dishes.name: Rice and Curry Food
dishes.description: a deceptively simple description that, on one level, is exactly as it sounds: rice served with a mouthwatering curry alongside, be that dhal, fish, chicken, seafood or vegetable

dishes.name: Mongolian Beef
dishes.description: a dish from Taiwan[1] consisting of sliced beef, typically flank steak, usually made with onions.[2] The beef is commonly paired with scallions or mixed vegetables and is often not spicy.

dishes.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
dishes.description: an Italian pasta dish of fresh fettuccine tossed with butter and Parmesan. As the cheese melts, it emulsifies the liquids to form a smooth and rich cheese sauce coating the pasta
